channel.title: Website To Watch Born Surviver: Bear Grylls?
channel.description:
I've become fascinated with this guy, and have really got in to his tv series, but it's not on often in the UK, and only on discovery like one time a week. Is there a website I can watch the whole series?
I've tried peekvid, but there's nothing there :(
Thanks <3

item.title: Website To Watch Born Surviver: Bear Grylls?
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Bear could own that gay man any day

Another good one is Surviorman but I think it’s only shown in the U.S.A.

Read full topic

item.title: Website To Watch Born Surviver: Bear Grylls?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:5, topic:112348”]lol hes ok… not as good as ray mears tho

my favourite quote from him is… “i could quite well die tonight”[/quote]

He is more of a survivor type person than ray mears. Ray mears has loads of equipment and is only interested in flowers.

Bear Grylls has only a flint, knife and water canister.

Read full topic
